text: Paruyr Hayrikyan (, born July 5, 1949, Yerevan) is an Armenian political activist and a former dissident. Hayrikyan was a internationally-known political prisoner in USSR. In 1987 he founded "National Self-Identification" Union. He is known for his struggle for the independence of Armenia. In 2013 he was shot and wounded during his bid for the presidency. == Other websites == * Paruyr Hayrikian * Bio Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Assassination survivors Category:People from Yerevan Category:Armenian activists Category:21st-century Armenian people Category:20th-century Armenian people
title: Paruyr Hayrikyan
